AI-Powered Recipe Generator

Intelligent recipe generation application powered by Google Gemini AI, featuring personalized meal suggestions, nutritional analysis, and Firebase integration

Full-Stack Developer & AI Integration Specialist April 11, 2024

Project Overview

Technologies Used

  • React
  • TypeScript
  • Vite
  • Google Gemini AI
  • Firebase
ai recipes gemini firebase react personalization

The Challenge

Creating an intelligent recipe generation system that can understand user preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients to provide personalized recipe suggestions with proper nutritional information.

The Solution

Built a modern web application using React and TypeScript with Vite for optimal performance. Integrated Google Gemini AI for intelligent recipe generation based on user inputs, implemented Firebase for user authentication and data storage, and created an intuitive interface for recipe browsing and management.

Recipe Accuracy
